name: Super Mario Wedding 64
description:
DISCLAIMER: All character mods released on our channel are purely intended for Machinima purpose. Characters won't have unique life icons or voice lines or any other character specific attributes (ex: Yoshi's flutter jump, Rosalina's spin jump, Peach's float, etc).

Instructions:

For Project 64 Users:

Set Your Memory Size To 8MB In Order For Game To Work.

Credits:

Mario Wedding In SM64 Was Created By Weegiepie YouTube Channel Link:
